Questions.question: Why do you want to work at LawnStarter?
Questions.answer: I'm excited by LawnStarter's focus on innovation in the landscaping industry and building scalable solutions. My experience modernizing legacy systems and architecting new applications, as demonstrated at Sony Pictures, aligns well with your engineering challenges, and I'm eager to contribute to a growing platform.

Questions.question: Describe your experience with Python and React.
Questions.answer: I have extensive experience with React, developing advanced UI features at Sony Pictures, as well as multiple personal projects using Next.js and Gatsby. While my primary backend experience at Sony Pictures was with Java Spring Boot, I also have experience using Python, and have used it to build backends including ETLing over 10 million records in PostgreSQL for my Dolores project.

Questions.question: Tell us about a time you automated a workflow successfully.
Questions.answer: As Environmental Manager at Sony Pictures, I automated the environment management process, ensuring seamless utilization by developers and QA testers, resulting in increased efficiency and reduced downtime. I also automated data cleanup using data fix scripts with Oracle and MarkLogic databases, improving data integrity and saving the team significant time.

CoverLetter:
Dear LawnStarter Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my keen interest in the Software Engineer position at LawnStarter. I have been consistently impressed by LawnStarter's innovative approach to the landscaping industry and its commitment to leveraging technology to improve the customer experience. The opportunity to contribute to a company that is disrupting a traditional sector with modern solutions is particularly exciting to me.

My experience at Sony Pictures Entertainment, particularly in designing and architecting business applications, has honed my skills in building scalable and reliable systems. As a Tech Lead Engineer, I led the modernization of a legacy Angular.js and Java Spring Boot codebase, which involved upgrading frameworks and remediating security vulnerabilities. This aligns perfectly with the requirements of this role at LawnStarter, where I can contribute to building and maintaining robust APIs and automating workflows.

My proficiency in Python, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, and Docker, as demonstrated in both my professional experience and personal projects, makes me confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to your team. For example, in my project "Dolores," I optimized the backend to handle high user traffic, ETL'ing over 10 million records with PostgreSQL and implementing Redis data caching, resulting in an average response time of 60ms for 10,000 clients/sec with 0% error rate under stress testing. My full-stack project, "Animedia," showcases my ability to utilize GraphQL for API interactions and ensure end-to-end type safety with TypeScript, further solidifying my qualifications.

I am also adept at using testing frameworks like Jest and React Testing Library to ensure code quality and reliability. My experience as an Environmental Manager at Sony Pictures Entertainment, ensuring the stability of non-production environments, highlights my commitment to maintaining system reliability at scale.

I am eager to learn more about this opportunity and discuss how my skills and experience can contribute to LawnStarter's continued success. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Yasin Khan

Questions.question: Why are you interested in GreenTech?
Questions.answer: GreenTech's commitment to sustainability resonates with my values, and I'm eager to apply my backend expertise to contribute to environmentally conscious solutions. I'm particularly interested in leveraging cloud infrastructure to optimize resource utilization, aligning with GreenTech's mission.

Questions.question: Explain your experience with cloud platforms.
Questions.answer: I have experience deploying and managing applications on AWS (Dolores project) and Firebase (Bambino project). I am familiar with using EC2, NGINX for load balancing, and other cloud services to ensure scalability and optimal performance for backend systems.

Questions.question: Describe a backend project you are proud of.
Questions.answer: I'm proud of the Dolores project, where I optimized an existing backend to handle thousands of users by ETL'ing millions of records in PostgreSQL, implementing Redis caching, and deploying on AWS, achieving impressive performance under stress testing. This showcased my ability to optimize performance and scale a backend significantly.

CoverLetter:
Dear GreenTech Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my enthusiastic interest in the Backend Developer position at GreenTech. I have been consistently impressed by GreenTech's commitment to sustainable solutions and its innovative approach to leveraging technology for environmental good. The opportunity to contribute to a mission-driven organization while utilizing my backend development expertise is incredibly exciting.

My experience at Sony Pictures Entertainment, particularly as a Tech Lead Engineer, has provided me with a strong foundation in designing, architecting, and maintaining robust backend systems. I successfully led the modernization of a legacy Angular.js and Java Spring Boot application, upgrading frameworks and remediating security vulnerabilities to enhance system reliability. In my role as a Software Engineer, I developed core business logic for backend billing and finance systems using Java Spring Boot and contributed to creating data fix scripts using Oracle and MarkLogic databases.

My technical skillset aligns perfectly with the requirements of this role. I have extensive experience with Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and AWS, as demonstrated in my personal projects such as "Dolores," where I optimized a backend to handle high user traffic, ETL'd over 10 million records with PostgreSQL, implemented Redis caching, and deployed the application on AWS EC2, achieving an average response time of 60ms for 10,000 clients per second with 0% error rate. My project, Animedia, showcases my proficiency with GraphQL, Prisma and NextAuth.

I am confident in my ability to contribute to maintaining GreenTech's cloud infrastructure and optimizing API performance. I am eager to apply my skills in designing scalable systems and ensuring their reliability. Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

Yasin Khan
